acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped char values with @PodamCharValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleCharValuesWithThePodamCharValueAnnotation

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.CharValuePojo

Then the Object CharValuePojo ( charFieldWithMinValueOnly = � charFieldWithMaxValueOnly = G charFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = charFieldWithBlankInPreciseValue = � charObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = � charObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = V charObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = @ charFieldWithPreciseValue = a ) should not be null
Then the char value � should be greater or equal than �
Then the char value G should be lower or equal than 100
Then the char value should be between 0 and 100
Then the Object � should not be null
Then the char value � should be greater or equal than �
Then the char value V should be lower or equal than 100
Then the Object @ should not be null
Then the char value @ should be between 0 and 100
Then the char value a should be exactly a
Then the char value � should be exactly �
